targets.query: volume({"type":"count","volumeType":"hits","view":"Resurfaced","timeFilter":"time >= now() - $timeRange","environments":"$environments", "applications":"$applications", "servers":"$servers","types":"Logged Error|Swallowed Exception|Logged Warning|Uncaught Exception|HTTP Error"})

volume({"type":"sum","volumeType":"hits","view":"Resurfaced","timeFilter":"time >= now() - $timeRange","environments":"$environments", "applications":"$applications", "servers":"$servers","types":"Logged Error|Swallowed Exception|Logged Warning|Uncaught Exception|HTTP Error"})

category({"graphType":"view","limit":5,"volumeType":"hits","category":"Infrastructure","timeFilter":"time >= now() - $timeRange","environments":"$environments", "applications":"$applications", "servers":"$servers","types":"Logged Error|Swallowed Exception|Logged Warning|Uncaught Exception|HTTP Error","pointsWanted":24})

groupBy({"type":"count,sum","field":"application","volumeType":"hits","addTags":true,"view":"All Events","timeFilter":"time >= now() - $timeRange","environments":"$environments", "applications":"$applications", "servers":"$servers","types":"Logged Error|Swallowed Exception|Logged Warning|Uncaught Exception|HTTP Error"})

groupBy({"type":"count,sum","field":"deployment","volumeType":"hits","addTags":true,"view":"All Events","timeFilter":"time >= now() - $timeRange","environments":"$environments", "applications":"$applications", "servers":"$servers","types":"Logged Error|Swallowed Exception|Logged Warning|Uncaught Exception|HTTP Error"})

groupBy({"type":"count,sum","field":"server","volumeType":"hits","addTags":true,"view":"All Events","timeFilter":"time >= now() - $timeRange","environments":"$environments", "applications":"$applications", "servers":"$servers","types":"Logged Error|Swallowed Exception|Logged Warning|Uncaught Exception|HTTP Error"})
